resources.string: There are no items in this list yet. Please add some first.
No merging is done. Exactly 2 projects need to be selected to merge.
The project contains bricks that access the web, and also seems to contain API keys. Please see %1s why uploading these keys can be dangerous.
There seems to be a problem with your connection to the service. Please contact the Catrobat team.

When you start as a clone
Kết nối với thiết bị thất bại!
There was a problem with face detection. Some components may still be downloading in the background. Please make sure you are connected to the internet and check back later.
Something went wrong while trying to use the camera.
There was a problem with text detection. Some components may still be downloading in the background. Please make sure you are connected to the internet and check back later.
Chromecast features disabled. Please enable cast features in the settings.
"Your project uses Chromecast bricks and can't be started locally"
Please connect to your Chromecast first
". Don't see your device? Try turning your device's Wifi off and on."
Bạn có muốn lưu thay đổi của mình?

Bật dịch vụ của Google Play
%1$s sẽ không chạy nếu không có dịch vụ của Google Play. Thiết bị của bạn bị thiếu dịch vụ này.

Phạm vi cung cấp các dịch vụ của Google Play

%1$s sẽ không chạy trừ khi bạn cập nhật Dịch vụ của Google Play.
Cập nhật dịch vụ của Google Play
%1$s sẽ không chạy nếu không có dịch vụ của Google Play. Dịch vụ này hiện đang cập nhật.
Cần phiên bản mới của dịch vụ Google Play. Dịch vụ sẽ sớm tự động cập nhật.
"Kết nối với thiết bị. Vui lòng đợi…"
"We can't connect you to the server right now, please try again later."
Đã sao chép liên kết vào khay nhớ tạm
Pan to draw, then tap again to stop painting.
Pan to position, then tap to start painting.
To use our app, it is necessary to accept our Terms of Use and Service. However, if you don’t feel comfortable to do so, you can use our free web-services on
"Deleting a variable or list that is still in use can cause errors. You can't undo this!"

"This app offers a coding environment and interpreter for the visual programming language Catrobat. The source code of this app is mainly licensed under the GNU AGPL v3 license. For further details on the license see the link below. "

"Hints provide you with helpful information while making your first project.
Visibility of hints can be changed in the settings."
Kiểm tra hình ảnh hoặc thẻ SD!
The image is too big to load. Tap OK to scale down the image automatically.
Image is too big to load

"In order to be allowed to use the apps and other services offered by the Catrobat project, you must agree to our Terms of Use and Service. You have to follow these terms strictly when using our apps and other services. Please see the link below for their precise formulation. "
To use this app, please accept our
You are all set. Enjoy Pocket Paint.
Có lỗi khi thêm gạch này
I could not convert %1$s. This seems to be an old Scratch project from before %2$s. Please try another one.
You cannot yet open the project. Please wait until it is downloaded.
"You cannot open the project because it wasn't converted correctly. Please try to convert it again."
Whoops! Failed to open Huawei AppGallery, please try again later.
I could not open this Scratch project. It seems that you have canceled the conversion/download of the Scratch project, or you have renamed/deleted the project in the meanwhile.
You cannot yet open the project. Please download it first and then open it.
An error occurred while copying project
Lỗi đã xảy ra trong khi sao chép gạch này
"Your download could not be started, seems there is a problem with our server."
Something went wrong while sharing the embroidery file.
Something went wrong while writing the embroidery file.
Something went wrong while importing projects.
Lỗi đã xảy ra. Kiểm tra kết nối Internet của bạn.
Lỗi xảy ra trong khi tải chương trình.
Lỗi xảy ra trong khi tạo ra một chương trình mới.
This app version is outdated. Update now?
The project is not compatible with this version of the app.
Một lỗi xảy ra trong khi tải về chương trình.
Lỗi xảy ra trong khi tải lên chương trình.
Username should only contain letters (a–z), numbers (0–9), dashes (-), underscores (_), and periods (.).
Password should be at least 6 characters
Email address cannot be used as username
Username should not start with dashes (-), underscores (_), or periods (.).
Renaming an incompatible project is not possible.
Something went wrong while renaming the scene.
Whoops! Our server did not respond in time, please try again later.
Your version of this app is outdated. Our Scratch converter only works on the latest version. Please update the app.
Whoops! Failed to convert the project, please try again later.
Whoops! The project seems to have disappeared or you might have lost access to it.
Whoops! Some parts of the project seem to be missing, please try again later.
Something went wrong while saving the preview image.
Something went wrong while saving the new description.
Something went wrong while saving the new notes and credits.
Whoops! Failed to convert %1$s, please try again later.
"This script can't be added to a Chromecast project."
You cannot upload an unmodified example project. Please change something and try again.
You cannot upload a project with the name \"%s\". Please rename the project.
Thuộc tính của đối tượng này
Bạn có muốn lưu thay đổi của mình?
The keyword could not be found.
"To show your formula's current result, you can use \"Compute\"."
"Variables and lists that are used in your project can be found here. You can simply insert these in your formula, or add new ones."
"In \"Sensors\" you can find information that your device records. For example, the tilt of your device, or the loudness of your surroundings."

"With the formula editor you can create mathematical and logical formulas that you can use in your bricks.
You can continue through this little intro by tapping the \"Next\" button in the bottom right corner, and you can skip it by clicking the \"SKIP\" button in the bottom left corner."
"Like a calculator, the formula editor offers many mathematical functions. You can find trigonometric functions such as \"sin\" and \"cos\", a random number generator, and text and list functions."
Here you can see and edit your formula.
This is where you can create your formula, just like on a calculator.

"Logic is used to compare values and combine logical formulas. To compare values you can use logical operations such as \">\" (greater than) or \"=\" (equals). To combine logical formulas you can use logical operations such as \"AND\", \"OR\" and \"NOT\"."
This is a collection of values that describe the properties of your current actor or object. Examples are the x- and y-coordinates, or the current speed.
Xác định giá trị đầu vào
Bấm vào \"+\" để thêm giao diện
Scan NFC tags to add them
Bấm vào \"+\" để thêm kịch bản
Bấm vào \"+\" để thêm âm thanh
Tap \"+\" to add actors or objects
Lists for all actors and objects
Variables for all actors and objects
Nhấp vào biểu tượng trên thanh công cụ phía dưới để thay đổi màu sắc hoặc kích thước cọ vẽ.
Hướng con trỏ chuột vào vị trí mà bạn muốn vẽ. Bấm vào để kích hoạt con trỏ. Di chuyển các ngón tay của bạn để vẽ. Bấm một lần nữa để tắt.
Xóa bỏ các phần của bức ảnh với tẩy.
Nhấp vào hình ảnh để chọn màu.
Nhấp vào hình ảnh để lấp đầy vùng với màu sắc được chọn.
Di chuyển ngón tay của bạn để di chuyển canvas.
Nhập hình ảnh từ thư viện lên công cụ tem.
Tạo các lớp mới hoặc sửa đổi các lớp hiện có.
Bấm vào để làm lại hành động chưa được hoàn thành.
Choose a shape and tap it to insert the selected shape.
Move your finger on the image on different drawings to smudge them.
Di chuyển ngón tay của bạn trên hình ảnh để tạo mẫu bình xịt.
Move and resize the rectangle to cover the area you want to stamp. Long press to select the area. Move and tap again to stamp.
Write text and format it. Resize the text box afterwards. Tap to insert the text on the image.
Sử dụng để biến đổi hình ảnh.
Nhấp để quay lại hành động trước của bạn.
Similar to the brush tool with a watercolor effect. However you can also change the strength of the brush with the slider in the color menu.
To add a brick to your script, tap on the brick you want to use.
All bricks are sorted in categories. Choose the category you are looking for.
Here you can find the different appearances of your actor or object. To add a new look, tap the \"+\" symbol.
Your program consists of different actors and objects that can interact with each other. To add a new actor or object, tap the \"+\" symbol.
The script defines the behavior of your actor or object. To add bricks to the script, tap the \"+\" symbol.
Here you can add new sounds to your actor or object. Remember using a brick from the sound category.

%1$s không thể sử dụng Huawei Mobile Services. Vui lòng khởi chạy Trình tối ưu hóa (Quản lý ĐT) hoặc chuyển tới mục Cài đặt để bật tất cả quyền cho %2$s (bao gồm tự động khởi chạy và khởi chạy thứ cấp), sau đó thử lại.
Kiểm tra cập nhật thất bại.
Bạn đang sử dụng phiên bản mới nhất.
Thất bại tải về gói Huawei Mobile Services.
Không đủ không gian trống. Không thể hoàn tất tải về máy.
Tải về thất bại. Thử lại?
Đang tải về Huawei Mobile Services | tiến độ: %d%%
Bạn cần cài đặt Huawei Mobile Services mới có thể sử dụng tính năng này. Cài đặt?
Để sử dụng tính năng này bạn cần cập nhật phiên bản mới nhất của Huawei Mobile Services. Cập nhật ngay?

"Dịch vụ này cần các ứng dụng sau sử dụng phiên bản mới nhất:
%1$s"
Không có kết nối Wi-Fi. Tải xuống bằng dữ liệu di động?
The actor or object could not be added.
The reason is that the following variable or list names are in conflict because they are used for all actors and objects and with the same name also for only one of the actors or objects:
Please rename one of these variables or lists and try again.
Shows the currently used color and opens the color picker.
Shows the currently used tool and opens its options.
Opens the layer menu and lets you manage your layers.
Switch to the tool you want to use.
Get started and create a new masterpiece.
Pocket Paint also supports drawing in landscape mode to give you the best painting experience.
Use the top bar to open the overflow menu and to undo or redo changes
Tap on a tool to get more information
With Pocket Paint there are no limits to your creativity. If you are new, start the intro, or skip it if you are already familiar with Pocket Paint.
The current project uses Lego Mindstorms EV3 bricks or sensors. For proper functionality please connect the sensors to the robot as follows
The current project uses Lego Mindstorms NXT bricks or sensors. For proper functionality please connect the sensors to the robot as follows

Nút truyền. Đã ngắt kết nối
To play this game in Multiplayer a Bluetooth connection is required. Both players have to start the game and be on this screen for the connection to work properly!
This name is already in use, please choose another one.
You only put spaces into the text field, please enter a text using letters, numbers or other special characters.
For all actors, objects, and clones in all scenes
For all actors, objects, and clones in all scenes of projects on connected multiplayer devices
For this actor, object, or one of its clones only
Note: The actor or object will be created without a look.
Tài khoản mới đã được tạo
Using NFC and face detection at the same time might lead to performance issues.
Please activate NFC and press Back to return to the app.
No internet connection. Make sure Wi-Fi or mobile data is turned on.
Bạn chỉ có thể hợp nhất hoặc sắp xếp lại thứ tự nếu tất cả các lớp đều hiển thị

Press to add notes and credits
"Can't enable Bluetooth, please try turning it off and on again."
Chương trình được tải lên bị từ chối
Someone else already uses this name. Please choose a different one!
A project with this name already exists.
This app needs the requested permission to function properly. In order to save images to the local memory, the app needs read and write access to it.

This app needs the requested permission to function properly. In order to save images to the local memory, the app needs read and write access to it. As you have denied permission with do not ask again, please go to your phone settings and grant the required permissions if you wish to use the associated functions.
You will be asked to place the new actor or object on the stage.

"Pocket Paint is a picture editing library that is part of the Catrobat project.
Catrobat is a visual programming language and set of creativity tools for smartphones.
The source code of Pocket Paint is mainly licensed under the %s. For precise details of the license see the link below."
"Pocket Paint's native image format. This format remembers commands and layers."
We are sorry to hear that. If you want to share your experience with us, please write to contact@catrobat.org
Intro does not support split screen.
Takes up minimal storage space. No transparency is remembered.
This format remembers layers. It can be opened by apps that support the Openraster format.
You are about to overwrite an existing image (hint: To save it as a new image, use the \"%s\" option). Save anyway?
Would you like to rate Pocket Paint?
Large text, large icons, large element spacing, high contrast
Add icons to categories and bricks.
Enable face detection bricks and sensors
Enable object recognition and tracking sensors
Enable pose detection bricks and sensors
Enable speech recognition bricks and sensors
Enable speech synthetization bricks and sensors
Enable text recognition bricks and sensors
Allow the app to control Arduino boards
Show cast button and enable cast projects
Allow the app to send crash reports automatically

Allow the app to control Lego Mindstorms EV3 robots
Allow the app to control Lego Mindstorms NXT robots
Allow the app to use multiplayer variables shared via Bluetooth
Allow the app to use NFC tags in projects
"Allow the app to control RobotixEdu's Phiro robots"
Allow the app to control Parrot AR.Drone 2.0 quadcopters
Allow the app to control Raspberry Pi computers
Edit to add or remove trusted domains
Project specific EV3 settings are not shown when opening a project.
Project specific NXT settings are not shown when opening a project.
Get help on how to configure the connection settings
The mapping of EV3 sensors to ports is project specific and can only be configured for opened projects.
The mapping of NXT sensors to ports is project specific and can only be configured for opened projects.

Your project gets uploaded to the app’s sharing site where others can use and download it. You can also download your project as a standalone app.

"This app needs the requested permissions to function properly. E.g., the Camera brick needs access to the device's camera, the \"location\" formula element needs access to the device's geolocation sensor, and in order to import and export projects from and to the local memory, the app needs read and write access to it. You can always change permissions through your device's settings."
Failed to save project, not enough memory is available!

The project you have downloaded listens to your voice in the background and also sends data to the internet. This may be harmless, and necessary for its intended behavior. However, please make sure that what you are saying while the project is running is safe. In case of doubt, please delete the downloaded project. You may also report the project on its page on the Catrobat community platform in case you are sure that it is harmful.
Tap the screen to define the new center position.
Something went wrong during sign in.
The username should not be your real name nor should it be an email address.
Bấm vào biểu tượng trên để bắt đầu và ngừng ghi âm.

Tap on copy to copy content
Looking for a free worker… Please wait…
Drag edges to their new position, then tap to enlarge or crop the image area.
If you want to revoke this permission later, you can remove the entry from the list of trusted domains in the settings of this app.

Please consider adding some kind words towards the original author in the Credits section on the community site or in the project options. Please note that the user will get a notification after your successful upload.

The project you are trying to upload already exists on the community platform in exactly the same form. Please change your project, ideally by enhancing it, before uploading your remixed project.
How did you create this project? Did you use ideas, scripts or artwork from other people? Thank them here.
Please choose up to three categories
Selecting more than 3 tags is not possible.

"WARNING: This seems to be a private project. You can try to convert it but it might not work."
By always allowing access, you will not be asked again to confirm web addresses from this domain.

Be very careful before allowing access, since the link may expose your personal information, such as your precise geographical location or any text you have entered to malicious others or to the public. See our wiki for more information why this can be extremely dangerous.
